sentences: WG III Co-Chair Edenhofer reported on the progress of the SR on Renewable Energy Sources ( IPCC-XXX/Doc.7 ), noting completion of the report by the end of 2010, and Taka Hiraishi (Japan), Co-Chair of the Task Force on National Greenhouse Gas Inventories (TFI), briefly reported on activities of the TFI ( IPCC-XXX/Doc.9 ).
